statements: SELECT * FROM waste_management_permits_and_licenses;
SELECT permit_id, permit_number, permit_type FROM waste_management_permits_and_licenses WHERE compliance_status='Active';
SELECT permit_id, permit_number, issuing_authority FROM waste_management_permits_and_licenses WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT permit_id, permit_type, issue_date FROM waste_management_permits_and_licenses WHERE issuing_authority='Environmental Protection Agency';
SELECT * FROM waste_management_permits_and_licenses WHERE issue_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM waste_management_permits_and_licenses WHERE permit_id = 1;
SELECT permit_number, permit_type, issue_date FROM waste_management_permits_and_licenses WHERE expiration_date >= '2022-12-31';
SELECT permit_number, issuing_authority FROM waste_management_permits_and_licenses WHERE compliance_status = 'Active' ORDER BY issue_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM waste_management_permits_and_licenses WHERE permit_type LIKE '%Transport%';
SELECT permit_id, issuing_authority, compliance_status FROM waste_management_permits_and_licenses ORDER BY issuing_authority, permit_id DESC;
SELECT permit_id, applicant_name, issue_date FROM waste_management_permits;
SELECT * FROM waste_management_permits WHERE permit_status = 'Active';
SELECT permit_type, expiration_date FROM waste_management_permits ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT license_holder, valid_from, valid_until FROM waste_management_licenses WHERE license_status = 'Issued';
SELECT license_type, license_id FROM waste_management_licenses ORDER BY license_id ASC;
SELECT permit_id, applicant_name, issue_date, expiration_date FROM waste_management_permits WHERE permit_type='Hazardous Waste' ORDER BY issue_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM waste_management_permits WHERE permit_status='Active' AND expiration_date > CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT permit_id, permit_type, applicant_name FROM waste_management_permits WHERE expiration_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT permit_id, applicant_name, issue_date, expiration_date FROM waste_management_permits WHERE expiration_date < issue_date;
SELECT permit_id, applicant_name, issue_date, expiration_date, permit_status FROM waste_management_permits WHERE permit_status='Expired' ORDER BY expiration_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM waste_management_permits;
SELECT permit_name, issue_date, expiration_date FROM waste_management_permits ORDER BY issue_date DESC;
SELECT permit_name, issue_date, expiration_date FROM waste_management_permits WHERE permit_id = 1;
SELECT wm.permit_name, wl.license_name FROM waste_management_permits wm INNER JOIN waste_management_licenses wl ON wm.permit_id = wl.license_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_permits FROM waste_management_permits;
SELECT * FROM waste_management_permits;
SELECT permit_name, issue_date FROM waste_management_permits WHERE issue_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM waste_management_licenses ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT permit_name, license_name FROM waste_management_permits JOIN waste_management_licenses WHERE permit_id = license_id;
SELECT permit_id, compliance_status FROM waste_management_compliance WHERE compliance_status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM waste_permits;
SELECT permit_number, issue_date, expiration_date FROM waste_permits WHERE permit_holder = 'Company A';
SELECT facility_name, location FROM waste_facilities WHERE permit_id = 1 ORDER BY facility_name ASC;
SELECT company_name, COUNT(*) AS number_of_licenses FROM waste_licenses GROUP BY company_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT report_date, report_details FROM waste_reports WHERE facility_id = 2 AND report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM waste_permits;
SELECT permit_number, issue_date, expiration_date FROM waste_permits WHERE permit_holder='ABC Company';
SELECT facility_name, location FROM waste_facilities ORDER BY facility_name DESC;
SELECT report_date, report_details FROM waste_reports WHERE facility_id IN (SELECT facility_id FROM waste_facilities WHERE location='City A');
SELECT facility_name, company_name FROM waste_facilities JOIN waste_licenses ON waste_facilities.license_id = waste_licenses.license_id;
SELECT * FROM PermitHolders;
SELECT holder_name, contact_email FROM PermitHolders ORDER BY holder_name DESC;
SELECT location_name, city, state FROM PermitLocations WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT activity_name, activity_type, activity_description FROM PermitActivities LIMIT 3 OFFSET 1;
SELECT permit_id, issued_date, expiry_date FROM WastePermits WHERE permit_type = 'Industrial' ORDER BY issued_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM WastePermits;
SELECT permit_id, permit_number, issued_date FROM WastePermits WHERE permit_type = 'Industrial';
SELECT holder_name, contact_email, contact_phone FROM PermitHolders WHERE holder_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM PermitLocations WHERE city = 'New York' ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT activity_name, activity_type, activity_description FROM PermitActivities WHERE activity_type = 'Construction' LIMIT 5;
